caption.p:
(A) Time versus the applied potential of CV with scan rate = 100 mV/s and (B) corresponding power spectrum of the potential in the frequency domain. CVs obtained by an inverse Fourier transform at different scan rates with CPE of (C) n = 1.0 (pure capacitor), (D) n = 0.9, (E) n = 0.8, and (F) n = 0.7. (G) Dependence of the charging current upon n of CPE. Equivalent circuits are composed of 100 Ω as a solution resistance and Q 0 = 10 –3 F/s
n–1 as a CPE.
